splash_screen1_desc: Easily and quickly track the amount of water you drink daily with Waterly.
splash_screen2_title: Track of the water you drink
splash_screen2_desc: Save the values ​​after drinking water and try to achieve your goal for all days.
splash_screen3_desc: We know water is life and we are trying to best for you. Set up a notification for the hours you want to drink water and we will send message you.
notification_screen_error_text: You didn't add a reminder yet
info_modal_1: With Waterly, you can easily track the water you drink.
info_modal_2: With the notification feature, you can set a reminder to drink water and receive notifications when drinking water.

premium_feature_subheader_2: View detailed montly and yearly drinking stats

premium_notificationsubheader: Free users set only 3 reminders. Premium users set unlimited reminders. Get Premium now and set unlimited water drink reminders.
